Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each motion blur quality level.

enabled.Wiki: If ON, then raytracing is enabled.

dirLightShadowEnabled.Wiki: If ON, then parallel light shadows are enabled.

aoEnabled.Wiki: If ON, then ambient occlusion is enabled.

dirLightShadowRaySampleScale.AltName: Directional Light: Shadow Ray Sample Scale
dirLightShadowRaySampleScale.Wiki: The scale to apply to the ray sample count for directional light shadows.

dirLightShadowRaySampleOffset.AltName: Directional Light: Shadow Ray Sample Offset
dirLightShadowRaySampleOffset.Wiki: The offset to apply to the ray sample count for directional light shadows.

aoRaySampleScale.AltName: Ambient Occlusion: Shadow Ray Sample Scale
aoRaySampleScale.Wiki: The scale to apply to the ray sample count for ambient occlusion shadows.

aoRaySampleOffset.AltName: Ambient Occlusion: Shadow Ray Sample Offset
aoRaySampleOffset.Wiki: The offset to apply to the ray sample count for ambient occlusion shadows.

dirLightShadowConeScale.Wiki: The scale of the shadow cone used for directional lighting. In the range of 0 to 1.0. If you set it to 0, the number of samples will automatically become 1.
